entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 30 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
